1127580.name: Smaller
1127580.description:
Enter Smaller, a world of things that are larger than you. Help George to overcome his shrunken condition and return to his right size. But, you must overcome the dangers of this fantasy world.

George, an ordinary guy, finds a magic book and it transforms him to a small ordinary guy. but thinmgs will not stay ordinary. This large world (remember, George is small) is occupied by hazards and quests. Use your magic book to solve puzzles and to navigate through the world. Encounter enemies and beautiful scenery. Meet characters like
  • Squiggly, the angry beetle,
  • mr Cannister, your helpful robot,
  • and many more
1127580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
